ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. :) One of these days, I ll have about 10 minutes to myself, and be able to hit the websites again.  :) At ... From: Noel Anderson
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. :)

One of these days, I'll have about 10 minutes to myself, and be able to hit
the websites again. :)

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Noel Anderson [mailto:noel@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 6:19 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Input on Recent digest Topics


Based on the Guardian Rhythms numbers I saw compared on the Concert Hall
months ago, the sharksin drums' percussion bonus is identical to the
Nostrolo tambourine. 23%, I think. Its been a while.


Suladan Starfinder
The Pantheon
58 bard, Innoruuk


> I'm afraid I don't know a thing about this tambourine. :/ What's nos?
> I'll have to look it up. :)
>
> It's better or equivalent to the sharkskin drums?
